title: Bakery Manager: Store Simulator
description: Bakery Manager: Store Simulator is a casual simulation game where you manage a bakery on one of the hottest strips in town. You get to serve customers, scan items, handle cash, and manage stock to keep the line moving and shoppers smiling. As your bakery gains popularity, you can unlock new bakery goods, upgrade the store, and expand the business into the townâ€™s go-to destination for sweet treats and more.
